                          javax.microedition.lcdui.Gauge ind,
                          java.util.TimerTask tt)
Method to be used for drawing an Alert
Parameters:
g - Graphics object to use for drawing
type - What type of Alert this is
txt - TextView used to display the text of this Alert
img - Image to display on this Alert
ind - Indicator associated with this Alert
tt - TimerTask used for Gauge's animation
